<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"List verifications"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/rest/api/v1/listverifications"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns the information to be rendered in verification dashboard. Includes information for each document owned by user regarding their verifications.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"query","name":"count","description":"Maximum number of documents to return","required":false,"schema":{"type":"integer"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"OK","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"documents":{"type":"array","items":{"required":["state"],"properties":{"metadata":{"description":"VerificationMetadata object"},"state":{"description":"The verification state for the document.","enum":["UNVERIFIED","VERIFIED","DEPRECATED"],"type":"string"}},"type":"object","title":"Verification"},"description":"List of document infos that include verification related information for them."}},"title":"VerificationFeed"}}}},"400":{"description":"Invalid request"},"401":{"description":"Not Authorized"},"429":{"description":"Too Many Requests"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
